name: The Shape That Shifts
description:
This game was made for a youtube video, it's a fun game but has lots of bugs and stuff to fix, you are welcome to play it and enjoy.

You are a square that can shapeshift when you are near a shapeshift machine. there are 4 shapes

Square, Triangle, Circle, Rectangle

Each shape has a special ability, the square can transform into a rectangle at any time. the circle gives you speed, the triangle is bouncy.

CONTROLS

D - MOVE RIGHT

A - MOVE LEFT

1 - SQUARE

2 - RECTANGLE

3 - CIRCLE

4 - TRIANGLE

K - KILL YOURSELF

WARNING!!!!!!! This game will make you rage!
